title: Tommy Hilfiger Lists Colorful Miami-Area Home for $27.5 Million | Beautycribtv.com
text:
Home > Lifestyle > Tommy Hilfiger Lists Colorful Miami-Area Home for $27.5 Million Tommy Hilfiger Lists Colorful Miami-Area Home for $27.5 Million beautycribtv February 23, 2017 Lifestyle No Comments 
Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger is listing his Miami-area home—which he renovated with whimsical design elements like scratch-and-sniff wallpaper—for $27.5 million. 
If the home fetches its asking price, it would set a record for Golden Beach, the small town where it is located, said listing agents Jill Hertzberg and Jill Eber of the Jills team at Coldwell Banker Residential Real Estate. The highest-priced home sale to date in Golden…
